name: Ichiban Dashi (First Sea Stock)
recipeInstructions: 1. Place the water and the kombu in a pan and let the kombu soak for 30 minutes.
2. Place the pan over medium heat. Just before the water starts to boil, remove from the heat and scatter the katsuobushi over the surface of the water.
3. After 3 or 4 minutes (the katsuobushi will have sunk to the bottom of the pot by this point), strain the stock through a strainer lined with muslin or a coffee-filter.
4. Refrigerate the stock in a tightly covered container for up to 4 days in the refrigerator.
